synopsis.text:
Shiki Ryougi's life takes an unexpected turn in November 1998 when she encounters Tomoe Enjou, a runaway boy claiming to be a murderer. In an act of kindness, Shiki offers her apartment as a safe haven for Tomoe, sparking an unusual cohabitation. Meanwhile, Mikiya Kokutou is investigating a double homicide at the recently constructed Ogawa apartment complex, which Tomoe claims responsibility for.

As the days pass, Tomoe is left in disbelief when he encounters his mother, whom he is certain he killed. This revelation leads Shiki and Tomoe to the Enjou residence within the Ogawa Complex, where they find Tomoe's parents alive and well. Shiki soon crosses paths with Souren Araya, a powerful mage and the mastermind behind the bizarre events unfolding around her. Trapped within a web of paradoxes, Shiki finds herself entangled in Souren's sinister plot, setting the stage for a dark and thought-provoking mystery.

The fifth installment in the Kara no Kyoukai film series, Mujun Rasen weaves together established themes and characters, creating an intricate and suspenseful story that will leave viewers questioning reality.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
